module.name: StaticContentSample
module.param: This dashboard provides Windows PerfMon information regarding LogicalDisk utilization for the selected Desktop. Clicking on the hostname below will take you to a list of the running processes for that machine. To view the entire result set or for this report or manipulate the data further, click on the View Full Report link below.

module.name: HiddenSearch
module.param: `perfmon_logdisk` object=LogicalDisk | stats last(Value) as Value by counter vm_name _time

module.name: HiddenPostProcess
module.param: | stats values(vm_name) as vm first(_time) as f last(_time) as l | convert ctime(l) as l| convert ctime(f) as f | eval message = vm + " From: " + l + " to " + f | eval range="vmsreporting"

module.name: HiddenPostProcess
module.param: | search counter="% Free Space" | stats max(Value) as max avg(Value) as avg min(Value) as min by vm_name | head 10 | eval avg = round(avg,2) | eval max = round(max,2) | eval min = round(min,2) | rename min as "Min % Free Space" | rename max as "Max % Free Space" | rename avg as "Avg % Free Space"

module.name: HiddenSearch
module.param: `perfmon_process` $vm_name$ | table vm_name Value counter process_name instance | eval mem = if(counter=="Virtual Bytes",Value,"") | eval cpu = if(counter=="% Processor Time",Value,"") | eval ioread = if(counter="IO Read Operations/sec",Value,"") | eval iowrite = if(counter="IO Write Operations/sec",Value,"")

module.name: HiddenPostProcess
module.param: | search counter="% Free Space" | timechart max(Value) as max avg(Value) as avg min(Value) as min | eval avg = round(avg,2) | eval max = round(max,2) | eval min = round(min,2) | rename min as "Min % Free Space" | rename max as "Max % Free Space" | rename avg as "Avg % Free Space"

module.name: HiddenPostProcess
module.param: | search counter="Split IO/Sec" | stats max(Value) as max avg(Value) as avg min(Value) as min by vm_name | head 10 | eval avg = round(avg,2) | eval max = round(max,2) | eval min = round(min,2) | rename min as "Min Split IO/Sec" | rename max as "Max Split IO/Sec" | rename avg as "Avg Split IO/Sec"

module.name: HiddenSearch
module.param: `perfmon_process` $vm_name$ | table vm_name Value counter process_name instance | eval mem = if(counter=="Virtual Bytes",Value,"") | eval cpu = if(counter=="% Processor Time",Value,"") | eval ioread = if(counter="IO Read Operations/sec",Value,"") | eval iowrite = if(counter="IO Write Operations/sec",Value,"")

module.name: HiddenPostProcess
module.param: | search counter="Split IO/Sec" | timechart max(Value) as max avg(Value) as avg min(Value) as min | eval avg = round(avg,2) | eval max = round(max,2) | eval min = round(min,2) | rename min as "Min Split IO/Sec" | rename max as "Max Split IO/Sec" | rename avg as "Avg Split IO/Sec"

module.param: | search counter="Disk Transfers/Sec" | stats max(Value) as max avg(Value) as avg min(Value) as min by vm_name | head 10 | eval avg = round(avg,2) | eval max = round(max,2) | eval min = round(min,2) | rename min as "Min Disk Transfers/Sec" | rename max as "Max Disk Transfers/Sec" | rename avg as "Avg Disk Transfers/Sec"
